review.title: “A great place to work. Fun, Family, Quirky, and Flavorful!”
review.pros: Pros – * Torani allows you to be who you are as a person.* I am able to have a good work/life balance.* I really enjoy the products.* My co-workers enjoy their jobs and like to have fun.* We have parties and celebrate our successes.* I feel valued as a person here.* I feel that upper management does care about me.
review.cons: Cons – There isn't a lot that I would say are "downsides" to working here.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Leadership can improve upon communications. Sometimes it feels that a few items don't trickle down to all employees at Torani. I think this is improving though.

review.title: “Fun and Colorful work environment”
review.pros: Pros – Free Lattes dailyWork/life balance is fair.Annual field trips.Small and close knit family feel.innovation and growth will be big in the years to come
review.cons: Cons – Salary is lower than most places.Not much room for career growth.average to below average amount of time off.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Act quicker on market trends and opportunities. Take bigger risks when it comes to business opportunities. Higher some younger more enthusiatic sales people and lastly create a more fun work environment.
